unmap-app.title: Unmap Route from Application
unmap-app.description: Are you sure you want to unmap '{{ route }}'
unmap-app.error: There was a problem detaching this route. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the Administrator.

unmap-apps.title: Unmap Route from Applications
unmap-apps.partial-error: Some applications failed to unmap from route

delete.title: Delete Route
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete '{{ route }}'?
delete.error: There was a problem deleting this route. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the Administrator.
